local-land-charge.description: Identifier of the Charge issued by Land Registry.

registration-date.description: Date the item was entered into the register.

originating-authority-charge-identifier.description: The ID of the charge form (i) if an existing digital system -the ID within that system, (ii) if paper/electronic - where one is currently allocated by LA use as currently exists within LA if not allocated by the first supplier to handle the records and agreed with the LA.

charge-type.description: The general category of the Charge (e.g. Planning, Financial)

charge-sub-category.description: The specific sub-category of the Charge.

charge-geographic-description.description: A description of the land affected by the Charge.

charge-address.description: The postal address of the land affected by the charge.

instrument.description: The document giving rise to the Charge (e.g. charge, deed)

statutory-provision.description: The statutory provision(s) under which the Charge has arisen.

charge-creation-date.description: The date the Charge comes into effect.

further-information-location.description: The location - physical or virtual - where relevant documents may be inspected.

further-information-reference.description: The location - physical or virtual - where relevant documents may be inspected.

land-sold-description.description: Description of the land adjoining the retained land that was compulsorily acquired.

land-works-particulars.description: Description of the reason why the land adjoining the retained land was compulsorily acquired.

land-capacity-description.description: A description of the capacity in which the land was acquired; e.g. Freehold.

land-compensation-paid.description: Amount already paid to the landowner from which the land was acquired.

land-compensation-amount-type.description: Description of the amount paid to the landowner.

old-register-part.description: The part of the LLC register on which a charge was recorded by a local authority prior to migration. Only required for migrated Charges.

originating-authority.description: The name of the Minister of the Crown, government department, local authority or other person by whom the charge is brought into existence.

migrating-authority.description: The Charge migrating Registering Authority name.

migration-supplier.description: The name of the migration supplier for the Charge.

expiry-date.description: The date on which a Land Interest in respect of a local land charge ceases to exist.

end-date.description: The date the charge Item is cancelled on the register.

start-date.description: The date the charge Item is added to the register.

author.description: The author of the current charge item state (e.g. who created, updated or cancelled a charge)

applicant-name.description: The name of the individual or organisation applying for the light obstruction notice

author.description: The author of the current charge item state (e.g. who created, updated or cancelled a charge)

full-name.description: The full name of the author, computed by first name + second name
